description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Badge' which serves as a small status indicator with customizable appearance and optional tooltip. It imports React and the 'clsx' library for class name management, and exports the Badge component as the default export.

methods.name: Badge({ tone = "default", children, className = "", title, ...rest })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a span element styled as a badge with optional tone and tooltip, accepting children and additional props.

ctags.name: Badge
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Badge({ tone = "default", children, className = "", title, ...rest }) {$/
